metadata.feature_description: Manage post states through draft, review, and publish workflow stages

steps.action: Navigate to News page and configure Content Approval workflow
steps.expected: Workflow should be changed to Content Approval
steps.actual: Content Approval workflow was selected in Publisher Settings

steps.action: Click Create Post to create a new post
steps.expected: Post editor should open with Submit button (not Publish)
steps.actual: Post editor opened with Submit for Review option available

steps.action: Enter post title 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing' and content
steps.expected: Title and content should be entered
steps.actual: Title and content were successfully entered in the editor

steps.action: Click Submit button to submit post for review
steps.expected: Post should be submitted and show pending review status
steps.actual: Post was submitted successfully, showing Publish and Reject buttons indicating pending review state

steps.action: With post in review state, click Publish button to approve
steps.actual: Post was published successfully with 'Post Published Successfully' confirmation message

steps.action: Navigate to News page to verify published post
steps.expected: Published post should appear in the Latest posts section
steps.actual: Post 'Workflow Test Post - Claude Testing' appeared in Latest posts section

steps.action: Create new post 'Reject Test Post - Claude Testing' and submit for review
steps.expected: Post should be created and submitted for review
steps.actual: New post was created and submitted, showing Publish/Reject buttons

steps.expected: Reject dialog should appear with message field
steps.actual: Reject dialog appeared with 'Reject message' textbox

steps.action: Enter rejection comment and click Reject button
steps.expected: Post should be rejected and return to draft state
steps.actual: Post was rejected successfully with 'Post Rejected Successfully' message

steps.action: Verify post returned to draft state
steps.expected: Post should show Submit button instead of Publish/Reject
steps.actual: Post returned to draft state with Submit button visible (not Publish/Reject)

steps.action: On rejected post, click Discard button
steps.actual: Discard dialog appeared with message textbox and Discard/Cancel buttons

steps.action: Enter discard message and click Discard button
steps.actual: Post was discarded successfully with 'Post Discarded Successfully' message, page showed 'page cannot be found' confirming deletion

steps.action: Navigate to News page and change workflow to Direct Publish
steps.expected: Direct Publish workflow should be selected
steps.actual: Direct Publish was selected in Publisher Settings Workflows dropdown

steps.action: Click Create Post to verify workflow behavior
steps.expected: Post editor should show Publish button directly (not Submit for Review)
steps.actual: Post editor showed 'Publish' and 'Discard' buttons without Submit for Review option, confirming Direct Publish workflow is active

issues: Could not complete full publish test due to rich text editor content injection issues with the Redactor editor - the knockout.js validation required content to be entered through normal user interaction rather than programmatic input

observations: Workflow states are properly managed: Draft -> Review (after Submit) -> Published (after Approve) or back to Draft (after Reject)
The UI correctly shows different buttons based on workflow state: Submit (draft), Publish/Reject (review)
Direct Publish workflow shows Publish button directly without requiring review
Content Approval workflow requires explicit submit, then approve/reject stages
Rejection returns post to draft state with Submit button instead of Publish/Reject
Discard completely removes the post from the system
PersonaBar iframe frequently intercepted pointer events, requiring JavaScript workarounds for clicking elements
Copilot welcome dialog appeared multiple times during testing and needed dismissal
Schedule for future publication was not tested as the scheduling UI was not directly accessible in the current workflow
View workflow state history feature was not found in the Publisher UI - may require Workflow module access
Role-based workflow permissions testing would require different user accounts with varying permission levels
Notification on state changes was not directly observable in the UI during testing
